title: Sajid Javid – 2021 Comments on Covid-19 Clinical Trials
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sajid Javid, the Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 5 September 2021.
content:
The UK has been a trailblazer in clinical trials during the pandemic and we must harness that progress to fight future health threats.
